name: Elizabeth Gallagher
text: Out of the dozen or so places you can get pizza at in Brookings, Marco's has outdone them all and keeps me coming back. If you like thin crust pizza, you won't find a better place in town. The food is always great, and the staff is really friendly and engaging. Would literally give this place 6 out of 5 stars if I could.

name: Tye Theriault
text: Meatball bake was great (filling!) and so was the cheesey bread.  Everyone was pretty nice. I'll be back.

name: Laurie Brenneman
text: Marco's pizza is the best pizza I have had!  Fresh quality ingredients.  You can taste the freshness on the first bite!  In addition to the pizza, the cheese bread is the most addicting thing ever!  You have to try it!  Thanks Marco;s for coming to Brookings!

name: casey simmons
text: If you're just tired of the same old same old  Brookings has had for years. Marco's is your next stop. Great prices and choices. Straight up the best pizza in town!

name: Hymaly Viera
text:
I love the team of marcos i
Mess up my order i put BBQ instead of Buffalo and he change it not bothered that he had BBQ already that is a great service thanks guys for being awesome keep up the great job !

name: Lataivia Tunstall
text: Amazing pizza and wings. My opinion best pizza in Brookings. Fresh food and good service! Always fast delivery and not too long of a wait when pickup is ordered!

name: Brooke Barhite
text: Waited the 15 minutes to pick up, stopped by the window and my order wasn't ready; needed 5 more minutes. Went back and was told they forgot part of my order and waited another 6 minutes. They made good with free cheesy bread and apologized. Great service!!

name: Micah Perry
text: Great business, pizza is even better. Super clean interior and friendly workers. Highly recommend.

name: Josh Bakker
text: Pizza was great love the sauce and the crust. Would definitely recommend anyone to give this place a call and try their pizza.

name: Jesse
text: Had a meatball bake, Greek salad and cheezy bread delivered. It was fast,  but I wish it had never come. Food was so bad we threw 95% of it away, immediately took the trash out and opened the windows to get rid of the smell of it and drank â€¦More

name: Sam Schaapveld
text: Pizza was delicious!! Gally didn't like it but he's just my pet gold fish. So it's understandable he didn't like it. I think most humans will agree this is delicious pizza! Thanks for coming to Brookings!

name: Balaji Bali
text:
Stay away from this place if you want good service!
Placed order online, showed up at the restaurant at the time we were told to pick up the pizza. They had use wait for 10 minutes, then come and say the pizza â€¦More

name: Richard Chambers
text: Best pizza since I moved here 7 yrs ago good food good price

name: Judy Johnson
text: Service was good, and the people were really nice. Pizza was plain Jane and way over priced. There is way too many pizza places in Brookings to have plain Jane pizza.I don't see them being open very long.

name: Shillawan
text: Excellent service! By far the best crust overall great pizza.

name: Denise Perry
text: Delicious pizza. Fresh ingredients. Good value.

name: Shawn Bellamy
text: Thank you brookings, we appreciate your support and will continue to deliver the best pizza brokings now has to offer!!

name: Christopher Brown
text: Great pizza. I love Marco's, so glad they opened one in Brookings.

name: Kayli Oetken
text: Best tasting pizza in town! Great service :)

name: Ben Kallas
text: Great pizza, and the employees, especially the manager were very helpful and kind.

name: Beth Bellot
text: Great food great service best pizza in town

name: Ranae Guntur
text: Got our order wrong, were told to wait and that the manager would come talk. Waited for 30 mins, got the order, no manager and the pizza was not worth the wait and hassle.

name: Karen Bialas
text: Fast friendly service and great pizza

name: John Campbell
text: college town pizza - hot and satisfying

name: Cody Rose
text: They delivered a free pizza to the hotel I work at and it was delicious. ðŸ¤™ðŸ’¯

name: joshua bauman
text: Love their hot subs!

name: Thad Drietz
text: Best pizza in town

name: Kate Kern
text: Great new addition to Brookings!

name: Dallas Peters
text: Really good pizza.

name: Jesse Schmidt
text: Best pizza in Brookings

name: Nicholas Duncan
text: The pizza is amazing!! 10/10!
